newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-BARCELONA AND SAMPDORIA REACH AGREEMENT OVER KAREMBEU.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BARCELONA AND SAMPDORIA REACH AGREEMENT OVER KAREMBEU.

text.p: Barcelona said on Sunday they had reached terms with Sampdoria for the transfer of French international midfielder Christian Karembeu in December.
The news is likely to complicate Barcelona's problematical relationship with Real Madrid whose club president Lorenzo Sanz had said on several occasions that Karembeu would join his side.
"We have agreed terms with the player's representative ...you'll have to speak to the player," said Sanz when told of the news on Sunday evening.
